pages.title: Kamen Rider Storious
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Saber (2020, TV show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:saber/devices/dooms_driver_buckle#dooms_driver_buckle_storious)Dooms Driver Buckle (Storious)$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Slash$(li)Speed VII$(li)Resistance IV$(li)Haste IV$(li)Jump Boost VIII$(li)Strength VII
